Name: Pulp Fiction
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of apple wedge or slice.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass while also pouring lemon-lime soda.
Garnish with apple wedge or slice.
Review: Originally made with apple pulp, this drink has a zingy apple taste.
History: Discovered in 2001 at Teatro Club in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pulp Fiction contains 198 calories
